snippet.textDisplay: @floriasn There is a pretty easy trick. Just use the Config exe, press ok then play the game. This should fix the bug. When it doesnt work just press F9 during the Blackscreen, this will skip the Movie and you can watch it later on the CD :D
snippet.textOriginal: @floriasn There is a pretty easy trick. Just use the Config exe, press ok then play the game. This should fix the bug. When it doesnt work just press F9 during the Blackscreen, this will skip the Movie and you can watch it later on the CD :D

snippet.textDisplay:
This game isn't as great as I remembered it to be. One character was always great, though - Millenia. 

The story wasn't good, voice acting was terrible sometimes, the main character is totally unlikeable and boy did I want miss goody two-shoes to be killed off story-wise.

Fun gameplay nonetheless, nice artwork and good music helped to make it an enjoyable game. On that note - nice soundtrack!
snippet.textOriginal:
This game isn't as great as I remembered it to be. One character was always great, though - Millenia. 

The story wasn't good, voice acting was terrible sometimes, the main character is totally unlikeable and boy did I want miss goody two-shoes to be killed off story-wise.

Fun gameplay nonetheless, nice artwork and good music helped to make it an enjoyable game. On that note - nice soundtrack!

snippet.textDisplay:
What a game, again, I always forget how great some games in my collection are, good thing I never sell stuff. 
It felt kind of like a let down compared to the first one, but the story, the gameplay, maybe not the graphics but everything else, was improved, and I loved it.

snippet.textDisplay:
CONTRA: The fights repeat very often, it is only one way through it, the graphic is even old, there are not so much different enemy creatures.
PRO: The story is better than in most other RPGs, the fight within from elena with millenia,
the tactical gameplay, the cool special attacks, the upgrade ability, and it gets you feel with your characters, think about the lion(whats his name..?) you loose on the moon.....
snippet.textOriginal:
CONTRA: The fights repeat very often, it is only one way through it, the graphic is even old, there are not so much different enemy creatures.
PRO: The story is better than in most other RPGs, the fight within from elena with millenia,
the tactical gameplay, the cool special attacks, the upgrade ability, and it gets you feel with your characters, think about the lion(whats his name..?) you loose on the moon.....
